TEXT.S:
u Madagascarsa i labu nu Africa, itiza i 20 00 S, 47 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 587,041 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 581,540 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 5,501 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 24,430,325. kakalukan umah sa 71.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 21.50%, zumaay henay umah sa 7.40%. (Califomia),,(Greenland),(New Guinea)(Bomeo)(the Indian Ocean),(the United States) Madagascarsubal a kitidaan mikitabaki tu Amilika California (Ca-Li-For-Ni-Ya ), u satabakiay nu sakasepat a kitakit nu subal, mikilu tu Greenland, New Guinea (Sin-Ci-Ney-Ya ) atu Puo-Luo-Cuo (Bomeo). Madagascar a subalidai India a bayu (the Indian Ocean)nuatipan, u culil tu laad nu Amilika (the United States)nutipan a dadipasan nu bayu mibatad. (Sna Francisco),(Antananarivo),17,700(11,000),23 namakay nutipan a San Franciscokatukuh i Madagascara tusu, An-Ta-Na-Na-Li'-Fuo (Antananarivo), sawusi nuni bahelan nu hikuki han makaala tu 17,700 km (11,000), makaala tu tusa a bataan idaw ku tulu a tatukian mikacaw tu hikuki mabahel.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Antananarivo.
kakingingan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 26 bulad 6 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Andry Rajoelina (Andeli.Laciyawlina ·), 1974 a mihca 5 a bulad 30 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Madagascarayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihca 1 bulad 19 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Madagascarayza sa ci Christian Ntsay (·), micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihcaan 6 bulad 6 demiad.
kakitidaan a sapupu:,(the Tsaratanana Massif),, Madagascarlima kuni ka babenisan tu kitidaan: inuwalian a dadipasan ,amis a (Cai-La-Ta-Na-Na ) a buyu' (the Tsaratanana Massif), inutebanan a talakaway a buyu', inutipan a bayu nu dadipasan atu nutipan timulan a kitidaan. ,,800~1,800, teban nu talakawayay a buyu' nu kitidaan, timulan amisan satanayu sa nu subal, micapi tu bayu han makaala tu walu a lasubu(800)~ cacay a malebut walu a lasubu (1800) a kunce nu buyuan.Tsaratananaa buyu' itidai subal nu amisan, u hamim nu subal a talakaway nu buyu'. ,""(the Great Red Island), Madagascaru sumanahay namim kuyu lala' sisa pangangan han tu "tabakiyay nu sumanahay a subal" han (the Great Red Island), sumanahay a lala' milaecus tu nipaluma' tu tuudtuud. Madagascarnutipan atu amisan idaw ku micidekay a nu ba'tuan se-huy-yan. (Tsingy de Bemaraha National Park),, sasi nganganay a Cin-Cidadiputan a kitidaan (Tsingy de Bemaraha National Park). mihmihcaan numapaudad a makan, sisa mala micidakay nu se-huy-yan tai-ti ( Limestone Mesa) sa. [1]
demiad:114510 u wayway tu nu lala'an a kitidaan, Madagascara demiad katinengan kunika sasumad nu demiadan. Madagascartaneng malatusa ku demiad nuheni, namakayda i sabaw cacayay a bulad katukuh tu saka tusa a mihcan nu sepatay a bulad a nikasengetan caledes nu udadan a demiad, atu lima a bulad katukuh i pulu'a bulad sinika sapi'an tu a nidakedal nu demiad.
subal nu waliyan nu dadipasan u masengetay a kakitidaan, idaw ku masa caledasay nu langaw a kilakilangan nu niyaduan.
sisa, nina niyadu' han katayniyan nu puu' a tabakiya nu caledes nu bali atu masaliyutay a tabakiay nu bali.
tebanan nu talakaway a buyu nu kitidaankala sapi'sapi'an atu kala acakacakan nu demiad, u Madagascarhatidaaytu nu kaliwmaah itini i niyaduan ku kakalukan, sangaleben ku tipus ni paluma'an. 68 nutipan a dadipasan han u kakedalan nu lalangawan nu mahetikay a papah nu mulangawaay a kitidaan. kakedalan hantu i enemay a bulad katukuh tu waluway a bulad, u kahetikan nu papah a kilakilangan.
katayniyan satu nu udad sa, nika langdaw nu papah mapaadin i bayu bangacal sa adihan. Madagascara subal saacakay nu demiad a subal sa i nutipan timulan a kitidaan.
caay ka hina udad sisa, nina kitidaan hantu u adidi nu likelikenan a niyadu'. [2]
aadupanMadagascar idaw ku masahicahicay itini i kitakit nu satalakaway nu yadahay a aadihan tu aadupan atu kilakilangan. 200,000150,000-- itini i Madagascarmaadih kiya 200,000 a tuudan nu lalangawan, kiya idaw ku 150,000 nu niyadu'ay a cancanan nu aadihan a lalangawan, u micidekay nu cancanan a lalangawan nu kitakitay dumaan a kitidaan inai ku langaw u sakaetiman nu lalangawan. 5099%36 subal idaw ku micidekay a cilakay, pulung han makaala tu lima a bataan nu mahidaay u kapulusay a salu (, Lemuridae), siwa a bataan idaw ku siwa a kilac (99%) nu Madagascara balaut, atu tulu a bataan idaw ku enem nu mabahelay a ayam. 100%6% Madagascaru micidekay nu cilekayan a niyadu'an, itini i kitakit han cacay a lasubu a kilac (100%) nu mahidaay u kapulus nu salu (, Lemuridae), hina sumaday nu kakitil palung nu pangkiwan nuheni, atu enem a kilacan (6%) numi cidekay nu balaut (nika i nai ku kakunas) itida nami i subal amaudip. the South PacificSouth AmericaAfrica idaw kumaadihay i Madagascarkaadihan nu mahicahicaay a aadihan tu cancanan, u lalumaan a maudip sa itini mulangaw i Na-tay-pin-yung (, the South Pacific) atu Na-mi-cuo ( South America), caay kai tida i Fa-cuoAfrica . [3]
tademawsakay sayaway i Madagascarnu muenengay silumaay itida nu cinglaw. Indonesiansblack Africans mikinkiway tu tademaw a tademawan han saan i tusa a malebud nu sayaway muenengay i Madagascara tademaw u Indonesia a tademaw (, Indonesianscaay kaw Fa-cuo lumeniay a tademaw (, black Africans) sa, kilul satu ida ku namaka Fa-cuo-ta-lutayda mabulaw katuku i Madagascar.
idaw ku pabaliyuway tu Madagascara tademaw, nababalaki nuheni mahka maka tuku i subal sa, u Indonesia a tademaw (, Indonesiansatu Africaa tedemaw (Africans, ) umalamelay nu miduducay a tademaw sa. [Arabs][Indians] anuhicasa, katuuday numikikiway a tademaw saan, Madagascaru aydaay henay nu patidenga asiluma nu muenengay (itini i Madagascar, inai henay ku secisetay a nisulitan nu ba'tuay a mihecaan), numikilulay satu nu dumaan a binacadan a mabulaw satinaku sa A-la-puo a tademaw ( [Arabs]) atu Indu' ([Indians]) malalamel aca tu i niyaduay a tademaw.[4]
